REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2001 reute h f BC-GATEWAY-SPORTING-BUYS 03-25 0048

TEXT.TITLE: GATEWAY SPORTING BUYS INNOVATIVE DENTAL
TEXT.BODY: Gateway Sporting Goods Co said it acquired all of the shares of stock of Innovative Dental Services Inc for an undisclosed amount of cash. Gateway said the acquired company has contracts with 102 dentists in 144 locations. Reuter
